phrase_range_description: You can choose the range of phrases you want to practice. The initial phrases are easier, while the later ones are more challenging. Adjusting the range allows you to set the difficulty level according to your preference.
start_must_be_less_than_end: Start must be less than End
open_source_project_description: This is an open source project that allows you to practice a new language for free.
project_stage_description: The project is in the early development stage and only supports
support_any_language_pair: but it is meant to support any language pair using Language-Model (LLM).
please_give_it_a_try: Please give it a try and
current_support_exercises: We currently support only two exercises that are easy to understand. Therefore, the explanation provided is brief. However, I plan to elaborate on the text and the exercises in the future.
note_app_data_storage: Note: The app does not store any information remotely. All data is stored locally, and there is no backup available.
max_words_description: Set the maximum number of words allowed in a phrase. Phrases exceeding this limit will be filtered out.
